name: Cube game 3
description:
Thanks to Brakeys for the tutorial that helped me make this game. (I did add some of my own touches)

His channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYbK_tjZ2OrIZFBvU6CCMiA 

Controls:

D - Go right

Space - Jump

(This is my first game and I need to improve a lot. At least its sorta fun)
